title.rendered: My name is Estella and today I am going to be talking about my school camp experience

content.rendered:
Good morning, my name is Estella and I am going to talk about my school camp experience. This year, Y7 along with Y8 travelled to Santander.

There, we did fun activities such as river rafting, rappelling, and we learnt the process building houses up of mud. My personal favourite was rappelling but I enjoyed all the activities. The whole time I was having a blast and my friends and classmates were too. To me, it is important to attend these camps so I can discover new parts of Colombia and learn more about this beautiful country. Even if it is somewhere that I have been before, it is a whole new adventure when I go with my classmates.

It is a great opportunity for me to get to know them more. I love my school camp experience and look forward to the next one. Thank you for listening and I hope you are able to attend your next school camp.

Estella, Y7

To learn more about camps, please CLICK HERE
